Lexi.1: {{i18n:strings.oliver.lexi1}}Now... Rosa normally leaves some leftovers in here. Voila!#$b#Sweet Lexi'll love that.$1
Lexi.2: {{i18n:strings.oliver.lexi2}}Heh, it's your turn Lexi!$1#$b#(whispers) Lexi hasn't quite picked up the rules yet, but it's okay. They're so pleased when they win I haven't the heart to tell them.
